title.zh: TalkFlow - 去中心化AI通信工具

excerpt.zh: 去中心化人工智能应用，包含端到端加密聊天、AI通信工具、通用AI控制器和物联网控制器。支持无人机控制、私有AI连接等创新功能。
excerpt.en: Decentralized artificial intelligence application with end-to-end encrypted chat, AI communication tools, universal AI controller and IoT controller. Supports drone control, private AI connection and other innovative features.

description.zh: TalkFlow是一个革命性的去中心化人工智能应用，旨在通过便携设备随时随地连接家庭私有AI。它不仅是一个聊天应用，更是一个完整的AI控制生态系统，支持无人机控制、物联网设备管理等高级功能。所有通信都采用军用级加密标准，无需依赖云服务器。
description.en: TalkFlow is a revolutionary decentralized artificial intelligence application designed to connect to home private AI anytime, anywhere through portable devices. It is not only a chat application, but also a complete AI control ecosystem that supports advanced functions such as drone control and IoT device management. All communications use military-grade encryption standards without relying on cloud servers.

zh: 去中心化端到端加密聊天应用
去中心化人工智能通信工具
去中心化物联网控制器
全球去中心化分布式网状通信网络
en: Global decentralized distributed mesh communication network

excerpt.zh: 强大的点对点Web应用开发工具包，让你能够构建离线优先的渐进式Web应用，支持实时P2P数据同步和端到端加密。
excerpt.en: Powerful peer-to-peer web application development toolkit that enables you to build offline-first progressive web applications with real-time P2P data synchronization and end-to-end encryption.

description.zh: Gun-Vue是一个革命性的点对点Web应用工具包，结合了Gun的去中心化数据库、SEA加密技术和Vue 3的现代前端能力。它让开发者能够快速构建无需中心化服务器的去中心化Web应用，支持离线优先、实时同步和端到端加密。
description.en: Gun-Vue is a revolutionary peer-to-peer web application toolkit that combines Gun's decentralized database, SEA encryption technology, and Vue 3's modern frontend capabilities. It enables developers to quickly build decentralized web applications without centralized servers, supporting offline-first, real-time synchronization, and end-to-end encryption.

zh: 离线优先的渐进式Web应用(PWA)
人类可识别的视觉公钥表示

title.zh: Gun Database - 去中心化图数据同步协议
title.en: Gun Database - Decentralized Graph Data Sync Protocol

excerpt.zh: 革命性的去中心化图数据库，支持实时P2P同步、端到端加密，被Internet Archive等数百个应用在生产环境中使用。
excerpt.en: Revolutionary decentralized graph database supporting real-time P2P synchronization and end-to-end encryption, used in production by Internet Archive and hundreds of other applications.

description.zh: Gun是一个开源的去中心化数据库生态系统，让你能够构建社区运行和加密的应用程序。它是一个图同步协议，具有轻量级嵌入式引擎，能够在9KB压缩大小内实现每秒2000万+API操作。被Internet Archive和数百个其他应用在生产环境中使用。
description.en: Gun is an open-source decentralized database ecosystem that enables you to build community-run and encrypted applications. It is a graph synchronization protocol with a lightweight embedded engine capable of 20M+ API operations per second in just 9KB compressed size. Used in production by Internet Archive and hundreds of other applications.

zh: 默认多人实时P2P状态同步
图数据支持键值、表格、文档、视频等
本地优先、离线和去中心化
数百个应用在生产环境运行
en: Multi-user real-time P2P state synchronization by default
Graph data supports key-value, tables, documents, videos, etc.
Hundreds of applications running in production

alternatives.zoom: Meething - 开源浏览器视频会议

title.zh: P2PMesh - 基于WebRTC的点对点网状网络

excerpt.zh: 基于WebRTC的点对点网状网络库，支持可靠消息广播、Kademlia DHT、模块化架构和岛屿愈合机制。
excerpt.en: WebRTC-based peer-to-peer mesh network library supporting reliable message broadcasting, Kademlia DHT, modular architecture, and island healing mechanisms.

description.zh: P2PMesh是一个基于WebRTC技术的点对点网状网络库，专为构建去中心化应用而设计。它提供了可靠的消息广播、Kademlia分布式哈希表、模块化架构和自动岛屿愈合机制，支持跨平台部署。
description.en: P2PMesh is a WebRTC-based peer-to-peer mesh network library designed for building decentralized applications. It provides reliable message broadcasting, Kademlia distributed hash table, modular architecture, and automatic island healing mechanisms with cross-platform support.

title.zh: Gun-Vue Relay with Ollama - AI通信中继
title.en: Gun-Vue Relay with Ollama - AI Communication Relay

excerpt.zh: 结合Gun数据库、Vue.js和Ollama AI的实时通信应用，支持智能对话和数据同步。
excerpt.en: Real-time communication application combining Gun database, Vue.js and Ollama AI, supporting intelligent conversations and data synchronization.

description.zh: 一个创新的实时通信应用，结合了Gun数据库的去中心化特性、Vue.js的现代前端能力和Ollama AI的智能对话功能，为用户提供智能化的通信体验。
description.en: An innovative real-time communication application that combines the decentralized features of Gun database, the modern frontend capabilities of Vue.js, and the intelligent conversation functions of Ollama AI to provide users with an intelligent communication experience.

title.zh: GunJS SQLite Adapter - 移动端数据适配器
title.en: GunJS SQLite Adapter - Mobile Data Adapter

excerpt.zh: 为iOS和Android平台提供的GunJS SQLite数据库适配器，实现本地数据持久化存储。
excerpt.en: GunJS SQLite database adapter for iOS and Android platforms, enabling local data persistence storage.

description.zh: 专为移动端开发的GunJS数据库适配器，支持iOS和Android平台的SQLite本地存储，提供高性能的数据持久化解决方案。
description.en: A GunJS database adapter specifically developed for mobile platforms, supporting SQLite local storage on iOS and Android platforms, providing high-performance data persistence solutions.

categories.name: AI & Communication
categories.description: 人工智能和通信相关项目
